headline: Now Streaming: Analysts boost Netflix targets after Q1 beat
summary: “Now Streaming” is The Fly’s weekly recap of the stories surrounding the biggest content streamers. PLAYING THIS WEEKEND: Among this weekend’s highly-anticipated new streaming content is the first few episodes of “Andor,” a drama series set in the “Star Wars” universe, on Disney+ (DIS). Meanwhile, Netflix (NFLX) subscribers can catch the fifth season of drama series “You,” as well as neo-noir action thriller film “Havoc,” starring Tom Hardy and Forest Whitaker. headline: Why Charter Rallies While T-Mobile Sells Off
summary: T-Mobile and Charter stocks showed outsized moves in opposite directions after Q1 results. Read more on the key factors behind TMUS & CHTR stock moves.
